text: I have a laptop and a desktop, both with Julia installed. On the laptop I have a directory src/juliapractice with a couple of toml files and some source code. On the desktop I have a file surveying/calc.jl which defines a function. I also have a Julia file as documentation in a C++ project, and some Exercism projects. The laptop's .julia directory has a subdir compiled with a bunch of subdirectories with .ji files in them. The desktop's .julia directory has only a logs subdirectory. How come?
